before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"f92ru","text":"Before starting cryo-EM grid preparation section: Set up Vitrobot at 95% humidity and 4C. Put new paper blot","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

84802.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bfv3r","text":"N-terminally tagged His6-Z-TEV-LRRK1(FL) was expressed in Sf9 insect cells. Insect cells were infected with baculovirus and grown at 27°C for 3 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1pcol","text":"Cells were harvested and then resuspended in lysis buffer (50mM HEPES pH 7.4, 500 mM NaCl, 20 mM imidazole, 0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol, 5 mM MgCl2, 20 μM GDP, 0.5 mM Pefabloc and cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitor cocktail (Roche).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"189na","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"56jfh","text":"Cells were lysed using a Dounce homogenizer and clarified by centrifugation at 50000 rpm, 4°C, 01:28:00, and Ti70 rotor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ek478","text":"The supernatant was incubated for 1 hr with Ni-NTA agarose beads (Qiagen) equilibrated in lysis buffer. Beads were applied to a gravity column where they were extensively washed with lysis buffer,  wash buffer ( 50mM HEPES pH 7.4, 500mM NaCl, 0.5mM TCEP, 5% glycerol, 5mM MgCL2, 20uM GDP), followed by elution in lysis buffer containing 300 mM imidazole ( 50mM HEPES pH 7.4, 500mM NaCl, 0.5mM TCEP, 5% glycerol, 5mM MgCL2, 20uM GDP, 300mM imidazole)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0qf4","text":"The eluted protein was diluted to 250 mM NaCl using dilution buffer (50mM HEPES pH 7.4, 0.5mM TCEP, 5% glycerol, 5mM MgCL2, 20uM GDP) and loaded onto a SP Sepharose column (Cytiva) equilibrated in buffer (50 mM HEPES pH 7.4, 250 mM NaCl, 0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol, 5 mM MgCl2, 20 μM GDP) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75l1t","text":"The protein was eluted using a 250 mM to 2.5 M NaCl gradient. Fractions containing LRRK1(FL) were pooled, diluted to ~500 mM NaCl, and incubated with TEV protease overnight at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"oj6c","text":"The protein was concentrated and put directly over a S200 size exclusion column (Cytiva) equilibrated in storage buffer (50 mM HEPES pH 7.4, 150 mM NaCl, 0.5 mM TCEP, 5% glycerol, 5 mM MgCl2 and 20 μM GDP).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b08hv","text":"The protein was concentrated to ~5-6 μM and flash frozen in liquid nitrogen for storage. N-terminally tagged His6-Z-TEV-LRRK120-2015 was purified using the same protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2ti55","text":"Guide for cryo-EM grid preparation of FL-LRRK2 bound to Type-I/Type-II inhibitors","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"csls3","text":"His6-Z-TEV-LRRK2 was expressed and purified as described in a previous protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vjl2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u48e","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fl3gs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":84802,"title":"LRRK1 expression and purification","title_html":"LRRK1 expression and purification","load_collapsed":true,"uri":"lrrk1-expression-and-purification-cw3axgie","image":{"source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_source":null,"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_placeholder":null},"creator":{"name":"Robert Fagiewicz","affiliation":null,"affiliation_url":null,"username":"n4qle132u1y4vle1","link":null,"image":{"source":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AFdZucpAG0wdQW60klnYvAjXuFZGG_71zq8-M-wmIVmIbQ=s96-c","placeholder":"https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/a-/AFdZucpAG0wdQW60klnYvAjXuFZGG_71zq8-M-wmIVmIbQ=s96-c","webp_source":""}},"stats":{"number_of_steps":8},"type_id":1,"guid":"78DE81301F6511EE9E9CF59C42CF2F5A"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1muf4","text":"Prepare LRRK2 buffer. Keep it at 4ºC.
20 millimolar (mM) HEPES pH=7.4
150 millimolar (mM) NaCl
2.5 millimolar (mM) MgCl2
20 micromolar (µM) GDP
0.5 millimolar (mM) TCEP","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"pov6","text":"Spin down purified LRRK2 (10000 rcf, 4°C, 10 minutes). Leave protein on ice afterward.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhpda","text":"For the best result, keep protein on ice and reduce the amount of time between spinning\nand freezing cryo-EM samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8stsv","text":"Thaw E11 DARPin and spin it down. Measure its concentration.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fr7p4","text":"Dilute inhibitors (diluted in 100% DMSO) to an intermediate desired concentration using LRRK2 buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f79mo","text":"Based on the initial and final LRRK2 concentration, calculate the necessary volume of E11 DARPin to get a proportional ratio LRRK2:E11 DARPin 1:1.25 in the sample. After that, add either MLi-2 or GZD-824. Dilute to your final desired LRRK2 concentration using LRRK2 buffer (150 mM NaCl).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dk5pm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3mo0t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cbas7","text":"In our samples, final concentrations were:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"emipk","text":"5 uM LRRK2 ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4plar","text":"6.25 uM E11 DARPin ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"4ch3i","text":"Either MLi-2 or GZD-824 at a final concentration 20 uM and 40 uM, respectively.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"crhhd","text":"Incubate 10 minutes at RT. Afterward, keep it on ice until grid preparation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7k4v4","text":"We used UltraAuFoil Holey Gold 2/2 200 mesh grids and plasma cleaning them in the Solarus II (Gatan) using the QuantiFoil Au preset.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8120s","text":"Apply 3 to 3.5 microliters (µl) of sample and plunge freeze. We used a
Vitrobot (FEI) to blot away excess sample and plunge freeze in ethane liquid. (In
our case, we use 4 seconds as a time blot as 20 sec as a wait time and 4 as a blot force, but these
parameters are slightly different from one Vitrobot to another. I would try
with the Vitrobot parameters already tested in your machine first).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6p03u","text":"Store grids in liquid nitrogen until ready for imaging","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Cryo-EM sample preparation for full length LRRK2(I2020T):MLi-2/GZD-824-E11 DARPin complex

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"ajv2l","text":"Handle liquid nitrogen with gloves and face shields equipped all the time. Handle liquid ethane with face shields all the time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6he","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
